amendatorysection.para: Senior companion volunteers providing companion services pursuant to the Nebraska Senior Companion Volunteer Program Act shall receive (1) transportation expenses for transportation to and from their residences and the place where services are to be rendered, (2) one free meal when reasonably available during each day that services are rendered, and (3)(a) accident and liability insurance, (b) an annual physical examination, and (c) a nontaxable hourly stipend of two dollars and fifty-five cents per hour.
